translations: 1. 取消抵押品赎回权：指银行或其他抵押权人因借款人未按期还款而采取法律程序，收回抵押品并出售以收回债务。
· The bank forecloses on the property if the borrower fails to make payments.
如果借款人未按时还款，银行将取消抵押品赎回权。
2. 排除，阻止：使某种可能性或行动无法实现。
· His lack of experience forecloses any chance of promotion.
他缺乏经验，使得升职的可能性被排除。

sentences.sentence: If you are facing problems meeting your mortgage, maybe you should sell the house yourself before the bank forecloses.
sentences.translation: 如果你所面临的问题，会议的房贷，也许你应该出售自己家银行之前的。

sentences.sentence: They have a very limited amount of time to try selling the house or get caught up in their payments before the bank forecloses on the property.
sentences.translation: 他们有一个非常有限的时间来尝试出售房屋或被夹在他们的付款后，银行取消抵押品赎回权的财产。
